scenarios.description: This scenario is to verify that all products have a valid category_id
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM products WHERE category_id IS NULL OR category_id NOT IN (SELECT category_id FROM categories)

scenarios.description: This scenario is to verify that the category_id of a product does not change once it has been set
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM product_history WHERE old_category_id != new_category_id
scenarios.error_message: ('42S02', "[42S02] [Microsoft][ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server][SQL Server]Invalid object name 'product_history'. (208) (SQLExecDirectW)")

scenarios.description: This scenario is to verify that the category_id assigned to a product exists in the categories table
scenarios.test_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM products WHERE category_id NOT IN (SELECT category_id FROM categories)
